text: Sano ndema jawajinjile wanganyao yawatite pakwapanga baba wao, nganiiwa yakwakamuchisya wanganyao ku chilichose chakuumila kwa Allah, pangawaga chisako chachaliji mu ntima mwa Yaakubu nichiwachikwanilisye (Yaakubu chakusaka kwawambasya ku makungu). Soni chisimu jwalakwe (Yaakubu) jwaliji ni umanyilisi ligongo lyakunâ€™jiganya Kwetu, nambo kuti wandu wajinji ngakumanyilila
